mapper.select: select a.*, b.ceo_name, b.setup_date, b.com_field, b.com_name, b.employee_num, b.com_type, c.address, c.detail_address, c.extra_address, d.location_name, e.location_name2, f.emp_name from tbl_announcement a join tbl_company b on a.ref_companyseq=b.com_seq join tbl_member c on c.member_seq=b.ref_memberseq join tbl_location1 d on a.ref_locationseq1=d.location_seq1 join tbl_location2 e on a.ref_locationseq2=e.location_seq2 join tbl_emptype f on a.employee_type=f.emp_type where ann_seq=#{annSeq}
